title: 'Ayurvedic soap good for health'
body: 'Ayurvedic soap which is quite beneficial for health during the hot & humid period of the year.'

title: 'Wellness that comes with extra bit of cost'
body: 'I like everything about it. Just the cost is bit higher.'

title: 'NoSmell/Smells Not Good.'
body: Smells like insect . Used only once and throwed away . Instead of this you can buy someother flavour Himalaya Soap. Much better than this Soap.  Incase If you wanna a buy this neem & turmeric. Just buy only one and test yourself . Don't waste your money on buying extra soaps.

title: 'Excellent product'
body: 'Far better than as compared to any other neem soaps.'

title: 'Suits my skin'
body: Like it's mild fragrance and that it's chemical free

title: 'A good product from Himalaya.'
body: Himalaya always tests it products before introducing them. I tried this product to see if it was as good as Himalaya ayurveda soap, and found it very good . This soap is mild and ideal for sensitive skin. The soap is nicely milled and does not get soggy . There is a smooth feel while running your palm over it that reminds one of cream soaps. This soap does not have a strong fragrance and its mildness is a plus point as it won't be harsh on the skin . A very good soap at a decent price.

title: 'Dirty product delivered'
body: 'Soap that was delivered had lots of dirt on it..it was disgusting..i thought if it was old product.. but manufacturing date was recent actually too recent to be true..so i think it could even be expired product sold after replacing old manufacturing date with new one..'

title: 'Not used...6 pieces of one type... boring..'
'good'
body: 'this soap is really good I really like it . smell so good and you feel the freshness for long time.'

title: 'Very very good product'
body: 'I used this soap after my postpartum. It cleansed all my dirt and refreshed my skin. And also i got clean skin tone.'

title: 'Not satisfied'
body: 'Not so good Received 3/4 powder of soap.'

title: 'Great product!!'
body: 'It is exactly what I expected. Great product by Himalaya. Thank you!'

title: 'Discount on MRP can be increased'
body: 'The discount given on E marketing is very less. More discounts on MRP would be better'
